text: The Battle of Odžak, was the last battle of the European theatre of World War II, it was fought from April 19 - May 25 1945. The battle ended 17 days after the official end of the war in Europe. The participants were the NDH, (the armed forces of Croatia) and the Yugoslav People's Army (the armed forces of Yugoslavia) the battle took place in the Bosnian town of Odžak and the battle was a victory for the Yugoslav partisans. This marked the end of fighting in Europe and the collapse of the Independent State of Croatia. Category:1945 Category:20th-century battles
title: Battle of Odžak
